content: round fit just beyond the edge of your cup like a coaster if not at this point adjust your gauge and try again or go down 1 hook size or up if it was too small the exact size isn t mission critical here remember yarn stretches so if you are a little tight here you are ok as long as your cup fits inside the circle medium cup- main body r7 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as chain half_double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 26 r8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop in same st as chain half_double_crochet in 3rd loop around slip_stitch to join 26 r9 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r10 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r11 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r12 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r13 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as chain half_double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 26 r14 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop in same st as chain half_double_crochet in 3rd loop around slip_stitch to join 26 r15 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop in same st as chain half_double_crochet in 3rd loop around slip_stitch to join 26 corinna s corner custom crochet you may sell finished items please link to pattern listing pattern is property of corinna varilek may not be sold or distributed ©2022 herringbone cup sleeve written in us crochet terms r16 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r17 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r18 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r19 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 26 r20 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain single_crochet next 11 sts single_crochet increase in next st single_crochet next 12 single_crochet increase next st slip_stitch to join 28 r21 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 28 r22 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 28 r23 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 28 r24 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 28 finish off and weave in ends add a cute tag if you wish finished size from table to top of sleeve is 5 corinna
